title: Beatbob
subtitle: a Discord music bot
description:
There's a plethora of high-end Discord music bots out there—backed by years of development and hundreds of hours of manpower. So I asked myself:

“Why not create my own?”

title: Sudoku Solver
subtitle: it does what it says
description: One of my earlier deepdives into figuring out an algorithm. Curiosity lead to Wikipedia, which lead to backward propagation. Now “I” can solve Sudokus.

title: ARAMinator
subtitle: a Discord bot for randomizing teams and champions in LoL
description: We wanted a quick way of randomizing teams and champions for our custom ARAM sessions in League of Legends—a Discord bot felt like the obvious answer.
